###
### Red Text Explainer
###
### Inspired by Ezeith's BL2 Red Text Explainer
###
### Adds explanations in the red text for all legendary/unique weapons and
### grenade mods.  Shields, COMs, and Artifacts have been omitted since they
### already detail their special functions on the card text.
###
### Text mostly summarized from borderlands.fandom.com, so take with a grain
### of salt. :)  Some weapons could use some verification, especially the ones
### whose special abilities appear to just be the "better" stats on the card.
###
### Generated by gen_red_text_explainer.py
###

prefix: RedText

# 9-Volt
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/Gear/Weapons/SMGs/Dahl/_Shared/_Design/_Unique/NineVolt/UIStat_NineVolt_Flavor.UIStat_NineVolt_Flavor,Text,0,,[Flavor]Contact.[/Flavor] (7 pellets in inverted triangle, alt mode changes zoom)
